instrument: IPIP representation of Cloninger's Temperament and Character Inventory (TCI)
citation: Cloninger, C. R., Przybeck, T. R., Svrakic, D. M., & Wetzel, R. D. (1994). The Temperament and Character Inventory (TCI): A guide to its development and use. Center for Psychobiology of Personality.
secondary_citation: International Personality Item Pool. (2001). A Scientific Collaboratory for the Development of Advanced Measures of Personality Traits and Other Individual Differences. Retrieved from https://ipip.ori.org/newTCITable.htm
license: IPIP items are public domain; TCI structure is Cloninger's

items.text: I love to explore new places
I tend to act on impulse
I worry about things that have already happened
I am sensitive to the needs of others
I continue until everything is perfect
I know my strengths and weaknesses
I set high standards for myself and work to meet them
I take others' viewpoints into account when making decisions
I feel a sense of connection with all living things
I often feel a strong spiritual or emotional connection to others
